div.div: Coast Guard Academy vs. Bridgewater State

tr.td: Bridgewater won the coin toss and elected to receive.
J. Shackleford kickoff 61 yards to the BSU9, C. Constantine return 31 yards to the BSU40 (Dante Adams).
